title: Always play underprioritized champions/compositions

embed.description: Hey all, Bunnymuffins here again with a new guide on an old but forgotten composition: Void Brawler Assassin 0:00 Intro 1:51 Early Game 2:30 Itemization 4:48 Mid Game 5:28 Positioning 6:01 Late Game 7:57 Alternatives 8:37 Conclusion 9:28 Outtro This recent patch has seen the rise of 6 assassins, blademasters/guardians, sorcerers/dragons, shapeshifters, rangers, and demon compositions, but somehow everyone forgot about the void brawler assassin comp, which is why you should be playing it.

body:
So I made a guide on Void Brawler Assassins, which was really popular last patch. However, I noticed that many players stopped building that composition, namely the champion Rengar, which means you can get him 3 star in many of your games.  It only needs two items (GA and BT), which makes it great for games where you do not get many items, so it is really consistent.  
These games were played on my D1 smurf and I was able to consistently force the composition.  Let me know how it works out for you guys, thought you might want some freelo

replies.body: Considering how many people play void brawler assassins, I'd say it's anything but "old but forgotten"...
